channel.title: Advance Tech Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Bringing you the latest in technology and open source news!
channel.itunes:author: Alexandra Moxin
channel.itunes:summary: The Advance Tech Podcast brings you advanced technology and open source news you won’t hear in the mainstream media. Hosted by Alexandra Moxin and Adam Dymitruk. We aim to give you the unbiased truth in advanced technology and interview a special guest who is defining the technology of tomorrow.
channel.description: The Advance Tech Podcast brings you advanced technology and open source news you won’t hear in the mainstream media. Hosted by Alexandra Moxin and Adam Dymitruk. We aim to give you the unbiased truth in advanced technology and interview a special guest who is defining the technology of tomorrow.

item.title: Erik Reppel and Robert Reppel
item.itunes:summary: <![CDATA[This week we interview Cryptocurrency, ICO, Blockchain and Ethereum expert Erik Reppel and Adaptech’s CTO Robert Reppel!]>
item.description: <![CDATA[This week we interview Cryptocurrency, ICO, Blockchain and Ethereum expert Erik Reppel and Adaptech’s CTO Robert Reppel!]>

item.title: Nikolas Badminton
item.itunes:summary: <![CDATA[This week we interview special guest and futurist, Nikolas Badminton!]>
item.description: <![CDATA[This week we interview special guest and futurist, Nikolas Badminton!]>

item.title: Dustin Krysak

item.title: Michael Feathers
item.itunes:summary: <![CDATA[This week we interview our special guest Michael Feathers of r7k Research & Conveyance and author of Working Effectively with Legacy Code.]>
item.description: <![CDATA[This week we interview our special guest Michael Feathers of r7k Research & Conveyance and author of Working Effectively with Legacy Code.]>

item.title: Scott Bellware and Nathan Ladd
item.itunes:summary: <![CDATA[On the inaugural episode of the Advance Tech Podcast we interview special guests Scott Bellware and Nathan Ladd, microservices and distributed systems experts out of Austin, Texas.]>
item.description: <![CDATA[On the inaugural episode of the Advance Tech Podcast we interview special guests Scott Bellware and Nathan Ladd, microservices and distributed systems experts out of Austin, Texas.]>
